feedback.title: Try again.
feedback.subtitle: Incorrect. Reading from above distorts the meniscus and causes inaccurate results.

alternatives.text: Nothing happens, the measurement is fine.

feedback.title: Great Job!
feedback.subtitle: Correct! Always read at eye level to avoid parallax error.

alternatives.text: The reading is inaccurate because the meniscus appears higher or lower than it is.

alternatives.text: Immediately remove the glove and replace it.

feedback.title: Incorrect.
feedback.subtitle: This can cause chemical seepage into the glove and skin contact.

alternatives.text: Wipe it off and keep working.

branchingQuestion.question: You spill a small amount of chemical on your glove. What happens next?
